Class ADO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ADO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Current, Daily, Hourly, Mars

    public class ADO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    CS2212 6_TheWeather ADO.java The superclass that contains all variables and methods common to all data objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      ADO()
      This serves as a general constructor for the abstract data object with no parameters

      This serves as the constructor to be implemented in Mars.java

      • ADO

        public ADO(int air,
   double wind,
   double temp,
   double min,
   double max,
   int humid,
   java.lang.String windDir,
   java.lang.String sky,
   javax.swing.ImageIcon state)
        Constructor for the abstract data object that initializes instance variables and loads the user preferences for units from a text file
        Parameters:
        air - the air pressure for the abstract data object
        wind - the wind speed for the abstract data object
        temp - the current temperature for the abstract data object
        min - the minimum temperature for the abstract data object
        max - the maximum temperature for the abstract data object
        humid - the humidity for the abstract data object
        windDir - the wind direction for the abstract data object
        sky - the sky condition for the abstract data object
        state - the image that goes along with the associated sky condition
